#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
#define lli unsigned long long int
 
int main()
{
    lli t,l,c,n,d;
    int b;
    scanf("%llu",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
    n=d=0;
    b=4;
    scanf("%llu",&l);
    c=l+5;
    c*=4;
    d=c+(b*b);
    d=(lli)(sqrt(d));
    d-=4;
    d/=2;
    if((d+5)*(d-1)==0)
    printf("-1\n");
    else
    printf("%llu\n",d);
    }
    return 0;
}
